Worcester.Soho Cottage: The Soho Cottage is a historic house at 21 Windsor Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. The 1-1/2 story wood frame cottage was built in 1860, and is one of the city's finest Carpenter Gothic houses (along with its neighbor, the Forest Hill Cottage). It has a steeply pitched gabled roof decorated with bargeboard trim and pendants, and has board-and-batten siding.
